attributes.action: Urge ISPs to cease blocking Websites that do not contravene UK law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BT, under the guidance of the Internet Watch Foundation have the power and are allegedly using it, to stop mobile broadband customers from accessing Websites, regardless of their legality, with other ISPs reported to follow suit (see http://snipurl.com/glzza).

This censorship, if unchecked poses a very real threat to free speech online.
